Interesting concept for a game, and it spawned an amazing sequel. Great stroyline, too. The only gripe I have is that it almost feels like a techdemo rather than a game - it's over quickly and there is almost no replayability once you've figured it out.

I've beaten this game like fifty times by now. Infinitely replayable, every single play is just as impactful as the first. Puzzles are hard but never frustrating, and while the story is simple, it's effective for what it is. Great!

Not a long game at all... but i guess in this case the developers went for quality upon quantity, perfect game for  beginers and also a perfect game to spent the time thanks to Corona virus... (you should buy the bundle of portal & 2)

Un clásico. El juego en sí es corto pero se disfruta bastante. Se te irán presentando diversos acertijos que resolver con las físicas innovadoras del juego. Se lo puede conseguir bastante económico con el pack de juegos de Valve, por lo que es una gran oportunidad para aquellos que no lo tienen aún.

Still a great game even all these years later. I'm kicking myself for not  jumping on board with this franchise until now. I did not think I would like it at all but must say I was pleasantly surprised at how good it is. For less than $20.00 if you buy the bundle it is worth it for sure. If for some reason you haven't played this yet do it, do it now. You wont regret it.
